actions.name: Brazen Ashes

cost.trigger: The user would be @Affliction[fainted] by a damaging attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user would be @Affliction[fainted] by a damaging attack.

Effect: The user does not gain @Affliction[fainted] and heals 100% HP. Then, the user gains @Affliction[boosted] 7 and @Affliction[chanted] 7. This can occur once per combat.
